lenders.name: Susan & Chas
lenders.loan_because: In Canada we have plenty and peace. Kiva gives us a real opportunity to share our good fortune directly with another person. We know that people cannot choose where they are born and we were most fortunate to be born here. Helping others in this way feels real and useful.
lenders.occupational_info: Susan has an online clothing company in Canada and Chas is a retired machinist and carpenter.

lenders.name: Larry
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a helping hand.
lenders.occupational_info: Business and Property consultant

lenders.name: The Burr Family
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I can.  I have worked hard to raise my family as a single mom.  I know how difficult it can be.  I was fortunate to have people who believed in me. It gave me hope. It helped me be successful. I want to share that with others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on the internet helping companies succeed in their online businesses.  I'm very good at it and I like doing it very much.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: I believe we all are better when we all are better.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people feel better about themselves.

lenders.name: Saskia and Sherry
lenders.loan_because: We are all one, and we all need support.

lenders.name: Vija
lenders.loan_because: It's a great way to help those motivated to improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a flight attendant on a commercial airline.

lenders.name: cherise
lenders.loan_because: because we are fortunate enough to be able too, we like to make a difference when we can. we want to help those who are trying to help themselves

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: I give to those less fortunate than myself, my mother taught me to do what is good.

lenders.name: Ken
lenders.loan_because: We're all in this together.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a nonprofit organization that encourages renewable energy projects (mostly wind power) in the Northwest corner of the US.  My job is to explain to power companies and government agencies why this is a good idea, and how the power system can work with lots of wind on it.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: Bill Clinton said it was a good idea.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English to people from other countries.

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed with all the necessities of life and wish the same for everyone.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a civil courtroom for Los Angeles Superior Court and assist the Judge with our cases.

lenders.name: Annie
lenders.loan_because: I have a lot more than most people do. So it makes sense to give when I've been given so much. I like the stories too - it really does make the world seem a lot smaller.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm currently an undergrad student at Baylor University. I'm majoring in Child & Family Studies - I really want to work with youths, maybe in a ministry setting, within a church or outreach program.

lenders.name: Pia Kitty
lenders.loan_because: I want to support dreams and people who work hard to achieve them.

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help those in need.

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: I believe in giving a helping hand to people that truly want to help themselves.  This is also a tribute to my Mom and Dad who are the most hardworking and generous people I know and my dog Dahlia who was my best friend and showed me true, unconditional love.
lenders.occupational_info: Strategic Planning Manager for an Automotive Tactical Dealer Network Market Representation

lenders.name: olollo, inc.
lenders.loan_because: olollo supports our counterparts across the world engaged in providing hospitality, furniture, manufacturing and related services.

lenders.name: Andra
lenders.loan_because: I love being part of a connected world

lenders.name: Devin
lenders.loan_because: it empowers people in this world who want a better life.
lenders.occupational_info: My work is to determine the position of property boundaries.  This helps buildings and bridges to get built in in exactly the correct place.

lenders.name: Keesjan
lenders.loan_because:
Make a loan
Change a life
lenders.occupational_info: The Dutch Postcode Lottery (Nationale Postcode Loterij) was launched in 1989. It aims to support organisations working to create a fairer, greener world by raising funds and increasing public awareness with the help of a lottery. Today, the Dutch Postcode Lottery is Holland’s biggest and most popular charitable lottery and supports 57 charity organisations. Since its launch in 1989, the lottery has paid out more than 2.5 billion euros to its beneficiaries.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: you need to give something back.
lenders.occupational_info: make a wish and it will come true. this is what i teach to others

lenders.name: Adrian
lenders.loan_because: everyone should have to opportunity to improve thier own life
lenders.occupational_info: I work with leaders of large companies to improve profit, reduce costs or make thier company a better place to work.

lenders.name: Ashley
lenders.loan_because: In a small way I want to help a little to make a difference to people's lives.

lenders.name: Gust
lenders.loan_because: It helps people to help themselves

lenders.name: Tekno
lenders.loan_because: better than online retail therapy (buying stuff on amazon.com) ; plus the added bonuses of not accumulating junk stuff, reducing carbon foot print and reducing trade deficit with china.. :-)
lenders.occupational_info: I sit in front of computer every day usually writing code for software application called AutoCAD. AutoCAD is used to draw building, electronic/mechanical parts, etc.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: This is a great program and I am happy to give. It is amazing to think that my friends and I can give $25 and truly change the world. Though we give to a person, economics tells us it's really a loan to a community.
lenders.occupational_info: Currently I am a graduate student at the Bristol University, U.K.  I am researching China's economic rise and the associated environmental issues.

lenders.name: Belinda
lenders.loan_because: The odd loan isnt going to burn a hole in my pocket, I have a decent living so I want to help someone else have one.
lenders.occupational_info: I have an administration job advertising/marketing a golf course.

lenders.name: Nathan
lenders.loan_because:
An old Chinese proverb says that if a hungry person asks you for food, don't give them fish give them a fishing rod. 

Kiva is in the business of providing the catalyst for positive change and I love the fact that I can assist by funding a few fishing rods here and there.

Kiva is about self betterment. It’s about helping someone who’s passionate, hard working and committed to improving their own situation, but just needs the resources to take those first few steps. 

I hope I am able to see the businesses grow and the positive impact it is having on the lives of the business owners using the loans.
lenders.occupational_info: We offer online marketing services to help medium to large businesses improve their online efficiency.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: I believe in Karma.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with people with mental health problems.

lenders.name: victoria

lenders.occupational_info: I develop and administrate continuing education programs for the Maritime industry.

make people, and myself, happier

lenders.loan_because: One little acorn...

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: When people try, the least one can do is to help within one's limits.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a professor of veterinary medicine, specialized in reproduction (theriogenology). I work mainly with horses, cattle and companion animals. However, small ruminant roots run deep in my extended family.

lenders.occupational_info: I sit at a computer all day looking at a screen, clicking keys on a keyboard, and sometimes moving the mouse. When I get the opportunity, I pick up a camera and take photos of stuff.

lenders.occupational_info: I work with middle school students of many cultures on how to use computers for something other than playing games.

lenders.occupational_info: I own a business that I started 24 years ago to sell science equipment to schools. Although our most of our sales are to schools in the U.S. , we ship around the world.

lenders.name: StevensFive
lenders.loan_because: We loan because it is inspiring to connect with people who also seek achievement and dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a hard working family privileged to live in country with vibrant economy, excellent schools and freedoms to pursue education and careers in areas which are fulfilling and enjoyable.

lenders.occupational_info: I am a choir director at a church, a piano teacher, a singer, and I am also a professional writer.

lenders.occupational_info: Shonnie works with people with health issues, helping them to make changes in their lives that will positively impact their health. lenders.name: Becky
lenders.loan_because: I think everyone deserves enough food to eat, to have a place to call home, and to have enough money to care for their children's health and well being.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with health departments' immunization clinics to find ways to get more people vaccinated against vaccine preventable diseases such as influenza, pertussis, polio, hepatitis B, measles, etc. Many people in the U.S. believe that vaccines aren't safe or necessary.  The lack of disease is taken for granted.  In other countries, where these diseases are still widespread, the vaccines are seen as lifesaving.  People will carry their children for miles and miles just for the chance to get a polio or measles vaccine, while in the U.S., parents are saying, "Why bother?  We don't see that disease anymore".  Unfortunately, we ARE seeing an increase in these diseases because more people are refusing to vaccinate their children and themselves.

lenders.name: Matt

lenders.occupational_info: I help people  make their  homes, offices or businesses warm, comfortable and functional spaces to live and work.

lenders.name: Mary Ann
lenders.loan_because: I like to supporting under-privileged individuals who are making an effort to better their lives despite their current conditions.
lenders.occupational_info: I make unique hand-crafted jewelry

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: It's great to reach out to each other...and help each other out whenever we can.  "Pay it forward. ' Maybe someday...if I need someone to believe in me and show their faith in my endeavor...someone(s) out there will be there for me...as I hope that I am now there for someone else.  "Love one another, right now!'
lenders.occupational_info:
employed in busy urologist's office.
assisting patients to receive best medical care possible from physician, diagnostic, and surgical services and aftercare.,

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because:
it's one way of making a difference
on a limited income.Being a blessing to someone else is my way of being grateful for my own.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a retired RR worker, by work part time at a funeral parlor. I volunteer at a food bank, and love prayer, music and almost all poetry.I have super kids and grandchildren.

lenders.name: Matt
lenders.loan_because: taking care of my brothers and sisters in need is what Christ calls us to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a pastor in the Moravian church. I preach and teach the good news of the resurrected Christ

lenders.name: Karen & Jack
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we believe there is enough good for everyone.

lenders.name: Anna-Maria
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to have money to share with others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a consultant with laws and regulations within the pharmaceutical industry

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.loan_because: I love Tanzania and I know that you can not out give God!
lenders.occupational_info: I have been to some third world countries and I know how blessed I am and I appreciate everything I have.

lenders.name: Casey
lenders.loan_because: I want to find ways to make the world a better place for my daughter--if we all reach out to lend one another a hand, the world becomes a safer place.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the government and process payroll, travel and provide assistance to the other employees in my office.

lenders.name: Roger
lenders.loan_because: I like to see people succeed.

lenders.name: Joseph
lenders.loan_because: i can

lenders.name: Sara
lenders.loan_because: I can!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a writer and work in community development with refugee groups in Melbourne

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.occupational_info: Retired engineer/physicist. Born 1934 and grew up in UK. Lived in UK during WWII. Worked for Rolls Royce and GE over 10 years. Consulted in USA and Asia for 30 years.

lenders.name: Simon T
lenders.loan_because: I respect that there are many people in the world who do not have access to funds to improve their lives.  I'm hoping that those who have the foresight and determination can be helped in some small way to be successful and achieve a dream
lenders.occupational_info: I work with specialist team members to build, develop or implement financial solutions in the banking sector.

lenders.name: Kristi
lenders.loan_because: In a small way these micro loans make a big difference.

lenders.name: Yael
lenders.loan_because: It's an awesome feeling to be able to help those who are truly motivated to improve their life.  Thank you, Kiva, for this opportunity!

lenders.name: Coralee
lenders.loan_because: Kiva povides a wonderful opportunity to reach out and directly support individuals with imagination and determination, where ever they may be in the world.

lenders.name: Christiana
lenders.loan_because: I am able to help and I've always wanted to give more.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with patients who have cancer and help them either get better or help them accept that they're dying.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: I want to grow the pie.

lenders.name: Eleanor
lenders.occupational_info: year of service rebuilding houses

lenders.name: Johanna
lenders.loan_because: I feel strongly that progress and change is in the hands of each of us as individuals.  If I want a better world -- socially, politically, environmentally -- it has to start with me, right here and right now.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.occupational_info: I help run a certified organic farm, and during the off season, I write for print and radio.

lenders.name: DePalatis Family
lenders.loan_because: We have been blessed with so much and desire to share that blessing with others, while learning, growing and expanding our own minds and experiences.
lenders.occupational_info: Dad is a high school English teacher; Mom is City Director of an international nonprofit organization that assists college-aged international students (Dad is involved too); Kids are in 7th, 5th and 2nd grade (boy-girl-boy).

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: I want to partner with individuals to improve their lives
lenders.occupational_info: Doctor and businessman

lenders.name: kelsey
lenders.loan_because: i have been blessed and i want to share my blessing!

lenders.name: peggy
lenders.loan_because: When I loan, I feel as if I am loaning to Jesus himself!
lenders.occupational_info: Teaching physical and fun games, athletics or sports to grades 1 - 9 boys and girls.  My second job is working for Starbucks making and serving coffee at a neighbor store.

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.loan_because: non ho mai visto un modo migliore di impiegare il mio denaro... esageratamente remunerativo, altro che tasso di interesse!!!

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: I believe in giving people the chance to become self-sufficient.  It's like the old saying, "Give a man a fish and he eats for a day, teach a man to fish and he eats for a lifetime."
lenders.occupational_info: Marketing is about finding and communicating with customers who want or need your product or service and will actually buy it.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company that helps people hear.

lenders.name: Mike & Jess
lenders.occupational_info: I am a business analyst for a global consulting firm and Jess works at a mentoring organization for at-risk youth.

lenders.name: Sammi
lenders.loan_because: It's so nice to see exactly where my money is going and who it is helping. I also love that my money can give more than once. It's a never ending donation.

lenders.name: Patty 4 WITS
lenders.loan_because: we want to give a hand up to someone who works hard to improve their quality of  life.

lenders.name: Dawn
lenders.whereabouts: Savigny le Temple ile de France
lenders.loan_because: I believe that those of us who are forunate enough to be living our dreams should help others do the same.
lenders.occupational_info: I am dedicated to helping others uncover their full potential and then use it to create the good they want in their lives and in others'.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others b ecome self sufficient.
lenders.occupational_info: I do training for companies and also do volunteer work.

lenders.name: Kimberly
lenders.loan_because: Instead of giving Christmas gifts to each other, my family decided this was more rewarding.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: I learned about Kiva.org from Bill Clinton's new book, "Giving." As he says, "every life is of equal value."  A small loan from one part of the world can create a ripple in another.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with people inside the US government and with other governments across the world to understand each other and cooperate in space.

lenders.name: Willis
lenders.loan_because: I like to help somebody out.
lenders.occupational_info: retired from active farming.

lenders.name: Jan
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference
lenders.occupational_info: I update and manage websites for an Australian science organisation.

lenders.name: Micah
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student at Belmont University.  My current job is to build community among younger students in our housing complex at school.  After I graduate I hope to design print materials or web sites for a music publisher.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: It is a great way to lend a helping hand.
lenders.occupational_info: Telecommunications - Risk Management

lenders.name: Ron & Carmela
lenders.loan_because: we like to help people to help themselves to better their lives
lenders.occupational_info: I own an architectural practice with 20 employees; I also own a business manufacturing light-weight concrete blocks and panels for building construction.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: Good, honest, hardworking people from every corner of the globe deserve help increasing the quality of their own lives as well as those of their patrons.
lenders.occupational_info: My work uses imagination as I am a writer and a filmmaker.

lenders.name: Dominic
lenders.loan_because: people need it
lenders.occupational_info: I help people to find jobs within the Financial Services industry

lenders.name: Leslie
lenders.occupational_info: I was a computer programmer, but now I'm retired.

lenders.name: The Truman Family
lenders.loan_because: We understand the value of capital to business and personal improvement.
lenders.occupational_info: We have our own Civil Engineering company.

lenders.name: Brian A. Sayrs
lenders.loan_because: in order to knock, opportunity needs a hand.
lenders.occupational_info: I work to strengthen my community by ensuring freedom, security, and opportunity for all, not merely the privileged few.

lenders.name: SAVES + AJ
lenders.loan_because: We get together for a Christmas party every year and in 2006 we decided that instead of giving each other gifts, we would do something for others.  Last year we sent a large care package to a troop over seas with their requested necessities and goodies. For Christmas 07' we chose KIVA because we believe that micro lending is something that anyone can take part in; it's so easy and you can keep on giving time and time again.  We plan on reinvesting our loan paybacks with other entrepreneurs on KIVA.

lenders.name: Junia
lenders.loan_because: Even if my contribution is a distant  and small loan, it gives me great satisfaction to be connected to people producing, adding value with their hands and hearts.  People being part of the solution, not the problem.

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: My parents friends showed me this I thought it was a really good way to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I doing my GCSEs
